Accession	P29372;G5E9E2;Q13770;Q15275;Q15961;Q5J9I4;Q96BZ6;Q96S33;Q9NNX5
EntryName	3MG_HUMAN
ProteinName	DNA-3-methyladenine glycosylase (EC 3.2.2.21) (3-alkyladenine DNA glycosylase) (3-methyladenine DNA glycosidase) (ADPG) (N-methylpurine-DNA glycosylase)
GeneName	MPG AAG ANPG MID1
Length	298
Function	Hydrolysis of the deoxyribose N-glycosidic bond to excise 3-methyladenine, and 7-methylguanine from the damaged DNA polymer formed by alkylation lesions.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Mitochondrion matrix; Mitochondrion nucleoid; Nucleus
